Control Name: 5.9.7 Traffic between subnets, Azure components and tiers of the workload is managed and protected.
Control Statement: Data filtering between subnets and other Azure resources should be protected. Network Security Groups, PrivateLink, and Private Endpoints can be used for traffic filtering.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.9 How have you secured the network of your workload?
